events.title: GST Compliance Workshop 2025
events.subtitle: Master GST filing, compliance strategies, and tax optimization for your business
events.content: Join us for a comprehensive GST Compliance Workshop designed to help business owners and finance professionals navigate the latest tax regulations. This full-day session covers essential topics including digital filing processes, input tax credit optimization, and compliance best practices. Our expert chartered accountants will guide you through real-world scenarios and provide practical solutions you can implement immediately in your business. The workshop includes study materials, networking lunch, and a certificate of participation. Perfect for anyone looking to stay updated with current GST requirements and avoid common compliance pitfalls.
events.location: Conference Hall, Hotel Park Plaza, Sector 62, Noida
